title: You can find out how much you have spent without contacting Riot.
body:
Because the email linked to your account has mail records for every purchase.

I find it nice and methodical going through my emails like that. And sickening. I mean, a few of the purchases were like "I feel like supporting Riot" but wow, it always shocks me as I add everything up.

TLDR;
DGS ~~needs ~~ wants a new pc and is broke.
